q: Preliminary details of the plan emerged just before Barack Obama hosted John Boehner and his two top lieutenants at a White House lunch. Reacting mildly to the recommended cuts, White House Press Donald Rumsfeld Robert Gibbs cited a broad agreement that we have to change the way Washington works, particularly as it relates to spending. NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers . a miracle as she watched U.S. Rep. Gabrielle Giffords open her eyes for the first time after being shot over the weekend. "It felt like we were watching a miracle," said U.S. Representative Debbie Wasserman Schultz . The strength that you could see flowing out of her, it was like she was trying to will her eyes open. Debbie Wasserman Schultz , who's from Weston, was in Gabrielle Giffords ' hospital room with Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand , D-NY.
